tool.name: In-Silico Labeling - Testing
tool.description: This interface sends Unix commands to run In-Silico Labeling TensorFlow program (Christiansen et al 2018). There are two modes: Testing and Training. This one is for Testing.

param.name: CropSize
param.label: Select Crop Size between 285 and 1500.
param.help: The default value is 1500. Though one can chose smaller value like 375 for faster processing.

param.name: Model
param.label: Select which model you like
param.help: The default value is pre-trained model.

param.name: OutputPath
param.label: Specify path for the output, where the predicted images will be saved at.

param.name: DatasetEvalPath
param.label: Specify path for the dataset, where the images to be analyzed are at.

param.name: InferChannels
param.label: Specify Inference Channels
param.help: If images are confocal for survival tracking choose DAPI_CONFOCAL,CELLMASK_CONFOCAL,DEAD_CONFOCAL or for all other uses choose DAPI_CONFOCAL, MAP2_CONFOCAL,NFH_CONFOCAL. But if images are widefield choose DAPI_WIDEFIELD, TUJ1_WIDEFIELD, ISLET_WIDEFIELD

param.name: ErrorPanels
param.label: Select wheter to simplify errror panels or not
param.help: For new images (not seen by algorithm) choose noinfer simplify error panels, otherwise chose Not simplify.

param.name: ImageFolder
param.label: Select Image Folder
param.help: This is to name the txt files being generated for output and error from terminal.

tool.help: Exports the Base Directory, and then Runs the prediction for the image folder.
